Helpers for binaries that use compiler passes, e.g.: nim, nimsuggest, nimfix

Imports

../ast/idents, ../ast/lineinfos, ../ast/lexer, ../modules/modulegraphs, nimconf, commands, msgs, options, optionsprocessor, condsyms, cli_reporter, sexp_reporter, ../utils/pathutils, ../backend/extccomp, ../ast/report_enums
